rules.description: Command + ` Grave Accent, Tilde to Esc
Shift + q w a s to Control + arrow
Map Ctrl-Backspace to forward Delete (forward delete one character at a time).
Command + ` Grave Accent, Tilde to Esc
Shift + q w a s to Control + arrow
Map Ctrl-Backspace to forward Delete (forward delete one character at a time).
